class.name: BTCheckAgentProperty
class.brief_description: BT condition that checks agent's property value.
class.description: BTCheckAgentProperty checks agent's property value against [member value] and returns [code]SUCCESS[/code] or [code]FAILURE[/code] based on the [member check_type].

members.member: Parameter that specifies the agent's property name which will be compared.
Parameter that specifies the value to which an agent's property will be compared.
